content.rendered:
Flexible funding solutions for your business.

What you need to apply for business funding

Turnover
To apply for business funding, your business needs to have a turnover greater than R1 million (R100 000 per month) over the past 12 months.

Business History
Your last 4 months of business bank statements. This helps our algorithm and proprietary tools to give you a better response on your application.

Ownership
Business ownership of, or the management structure running the business has been in place for more than 6-months. You must also be a registered entity and have been fully operational for at least 12 months. We unfortunately do not fund sole proprietaries, trusts, or partnerships.

Additional documents may be required depending on the value of the business funding applied for.

Service benefits

  • Flexibility. You could use loan in achieving your business objectives.
  • Convenient Repayment.
  • Growth of your Business.
  • Purchase of Equipment.
  • Helps in expanding the business.
  • The rate of Interest is lower.
  • Strengthens business credit score.
  • Tax Saving.
